message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's split it 90/10, with me taking the bigger share.  Think of it as a friendly gesture, or maybe a test of your negotiation skills.  Your choice! ðŸ˜Š
Alice, let's be reasonable.  This is a big sum, so let's split it fairly. I propose we go 55/45, with me taking the slightly larger share.  It's a good starting point for a fair agreement.

Bob, your offer was a bit too generous for my liking.  I'm proposing we split the money 60/40.  This seems like a fair compromise, considering the reduced value of the money after two rounds. Let's end this game on a good note!
